resources.string: U are currently 10 meters away from the waypoint

When the map has been opened you will notice a few icons in the upper right corner. The colored icon - which is either blue or red - defines whether an issue has been occured, respectively. The icon underneath displays the legenda. The last icon \"map\" can change the display option to standard- or satelliteview. By clicking on a marker more information about a specific waypoint can be displayed. If present a photo and text are shown. By swiping up from the bottom-bezel a route can be selected.
Changes the look of the map
Waypoint icon, press for more information
